Light therapy alarm clock: Design an alarm clock that uses light therapy to help regulate your sleep-wake cycle. This can be especially helpful if you find it difficult to wake up in the morning without an alarm clock.
Music alarm clock: Create an alarm clock that plays your favorite music or a calming melody to help you wake up gently and gradually.
Aromatherapy alarm clock: Develop an alarm clock that releases a pleasant scent, such as lavender or citrus, to help you wake up feeling refreshed and alert.
Smart alarm clock: Create an alarm clock that uses artificial intelligence to learn your sleep patterns and wake you up at the optimal time based on your body's natural sleep cycle.
Vibrating alarm clock: Design an alarm clock that uses vibrations to gently wake you up, rather than loud sounds that can be jarring.
